notesStmt.note: This manuscript may have been composed in early 1863. It may be related to the descriptions of the numbers and arrangement of the men in the hospital wards that Whitman included in "The Great Armies of the Sick," published in the New York Times on February 26, 1863. Whitman's description of himself as a "soldier's missionary" could also refer to Whitman's appointment as a delegate of the United States Christian Commission on January 20, 1863.
